definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lay hold of, wield ( = NH [[תָּפַשׂ]], [[תָּפַם]], Aram. [[תְּפַשׂ]], [[תְּפַם]]);—

lay hold of, seize (with the hand), acc. pers., Ge 39:12 (J ; + [[בְּבִגְדוֹ]]), also ([[ב]] pers.) Is 3:6, De 21:19, Je 37:14, Ez Eze 29:7 (in fig.; + [[ב]] instr.); c. [[ב]] rei 1Ki 11:30, De 9:17; arrest, catch, acc. pers. 1Sa 23:26, 1Ki 13:4, 1Ki 18:40, 1Ki 18:40, Je 26:8, Je 37:13, 2Ki 14:13 = 2Ch 25:23, 2Ki 25:6 = Je 52:9, Ps 71:11; in phrase catch, capture alive ([[חַי]]), acc. pers. Jos 8:23 (JE), 1Sa 15:8, 1Ki 20:18, 1Ki 20:18, 2Ki 7:12, 2Ki 10:14, 2Ki 10:14; seize city (acc.) Jos 8:8 (JE), 2Ki 14:7, 2Ki 16:9, 2Ki 18:13 = Is 36:1, De 20:9, Je 40:10; fig. Ez Eze 14:5 seize Isr. (acc.) by ([[ב]]) their heart (terrorize them); Pr 30:9 seize (do violence to) the name (acc.) of my God ; [[תָּפוּשׂ זָהָב]] Hb Hab 2:19 grasped (sheathed) in gold ; [[מְרוֹם גִּבְעָה]] ´[[ת]]: Je 49:16 holding (occupying) the height of the hill.

grasp in order to wield, wield, use skilfully : grasp sword [[בַּכָּף]] Ez Eze 21:16 (acc. om.), cf. Eze 30:21 ([[ב]] of sword), and esp. pt.: [[תִּפֵשׂ הַקֶּשֶׁת]] Am 2:15, [[תּׂפֵשׂ כִנּוֹר]] Ge 4:21 (J), [[מַגׇּל]] ´[[ת]]: Je 50:16, [[תּׂפְשֵׂי מָגֵן]] Je 46:9 (del. ´[[ת]]: v:Je 46:9 LXX Gie Co Du), [[מָשׁוֹט]] ´[[ת]]: Ez Eze 27:29, [[חֲרָבוֹת]] Eze 38:4; even [[הַתּוֹרָה]] ´[[ת]]: Je 2:8 they that handle (deal with, are expert in) the law, [[הַמִּלְחָמָה]] ´[[ת]]: Nu 31:27 (P) those skilled in war.—Je 34:8 v. infr.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: pf. 3 ms. [[נִתְפַּשׂ]] Ez Eze 19:4, 2 fs. [[נִתְפַּשְׂתְּ]] JeJe 50:24, etc.; Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּתָּפֵשׂ]] Je 51:41, 2 ms. [[תִּתָּפֵשׂ]] Je 34:3, Je 38:23, etc,; Inf. cstr. [[לְהִתָּפֵשׂ]] Ez Eze 21:28;—be seized, arrested, caught (sts. ‖[[נִלְכַּד ]]), subj. pers., Je 38:23 ([[ב]] instr.), Je 50:24 (fig. of Bab.), also (c. [[ב]] instr.) Ez Eze 12:13, Eze 17:20, Eze 19:4, Eze 19:8 (both fig. of Israel), Eze 21:29, and (without [[ב]]) v:Eze 21:28, Nu 5:13; + Inf. abs.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: [[תָּפשׁׂ תִּתָּפֵשׂ]] Je 34:3; be seized, of fortress, city Je 48:41 (both ‖[[נִלְכַּד ]]), Je 50:46, cf. Je 51:32; fig. Ps 10:2 may they be caught in ([[ב]]) the devices which they have planned.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תְּתַפֵּשׂ]] Pr 30:28 a lizard thou mayest grasp with the hands ([[ב]]);—or rd. [[תִּתָּפֵשׂ]] Niph. Impf. 3 fs., v. De Toy.
